column4: if i want to install compiz-fusion, do i have to uninstall beryl and compiz?
fusion is an extension of compiz. And ask in #ubuntu-effects please
how did you turn it off?
i didn't.. i ran firefox as root and youtube tells me i either don't have flashplayer or have javascript turned off
well don't run firefox as root
do you know what root is?
i know what root is, i know it's dangerous to run stuff as root, i know you want to call me stupid for doing so.. can i do this?
what are you really trying to achieve by running root?
lets fix that problem rather than this one.
i don't want to fix that problem
then I'm afraid we can't help you here.
i don't really care... :/ #ubuntu-ops if you want to contest that ban.
